resources.string: Welcome to Yahtzee! Follow instructions to play the game. Help will be available when appropriate via a button at the bottom of the screen. Press next to continue.
Roll to determine who will go first. Player die is on the left, and computer on the right.
You and the computer tied! Please roll again.
Roll randomly on left; manual input on right.
Click the left button to roll dice; click the right button to manually input roll.
Locked dice are displayed in red. Select unlocked dice to reroll; they will be highlighted in blue. If none are selected, you must stand.
The computer has decided to stand. Press next to continue.
